text: Is this for real? I knew there was something suspicious about those pigeons!
Haha, it's a fun idea, but I think the study is probably from a parody site. Pigeons being robots is a classic conspiracy theory though.
You never know, the government could be hiding all sorts of advanced tech from us. Would make for a great Sci-Fi movie though!
I can already see the movie title - "Pigeonbot: Coos of Mass Surveillance"
I, for one, welcome our new pigeon overlords. They've been secretly watching us for years!
What if pigeons were really sent by aliens to observe human behavior? 🤔
That's an interesting twist! "The Pigeon Files: Alien Reconnaissance" - a spinoff series on Netflix soon!
I'd binge-watch that! And maybe they're not just pigeons - squirrels too? They're everywhere!
Don't forget the crows! They're super intelligent and always seem to be watching us...
